title: How is an S earned?
body:
just went 21/5/8 on urf with 104 cs, while another team mate went 15/5/12 with 69 cs, I got an A but they got an S. Was wondering is this because of assists or does it have to do with the role of the character played as well? Thanks! 

Its urf, not like it matters but was just wondering.

replies.body: Not entirely sure about this one but it bases off how well people do on average with that champion.
This, but it also takes things into account like ward score (I think), objectives taken, and so on.

> [{quoted}](name=AuroraMagic,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0uxK1VLF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-13T05:11:53.600+0000)
>
> Not entirely sure about this one but it bases off how well people do on average with that champion.

That makes a lot more sense! I was lux and he was Tahm, so I was confused haha. Thanks!
You're rated against how other people perform on that same champ in the same role in that game mode.
I went 5/1/8 cs 57 still got a S- gg
